job_title: Technical Architect – Java w/ GCP & MongoDB
jd: From: Revanth, Sun-Itsolutions revanth@sun-itsolutions.com Reply to: revanth@sun-itsolutions.com Hi Partners, Please share profiles for below position: Connect over me on linkedin for more updates : https://www.linkedin.com/in/revanth-yadav-parvathi-55b48b225/ Note: CPT & H1B & OPT consultants are not workable for this role Mandatory Skill need to check while submitting resumes: Job Title: Technical Architect – Java w/ GCP & MongoDBHybrid - Duluth, GA (onsite 3 days weekly) # of Positions: 1Length of Assignment: approx. 8 months w/ possible extensionsInterview Process: 1 internal + 1 client round Required Skills:o 1. Strong background in Java (Java 8 and Java 11), Spring Boot and MongoDBo 2. Experience with cloud architecture and design, specifically with Google Cloud Platform (GCP).o 3. Excellent problem-solving, analytical interpersonal and communication skills. Job Summary:1. Architecture Design:o Develop and implement enterprise architecture solutions using TOGAF framework.o Design and implement microservices architecture for scalable and resilient applications.o Lead the design and development of web applications using Spring Boot, Java 8, Java 11,MongoDB, React JS/Vue JS (preferred).2. Cloud Solutions:o Architect and design cloud solutions using Google Cloud Platform (GCP) to ensure scalability, reliability, and performance.o Develop cloud-native applications and migrate existing applications to the cloud.3. Solution Architecture:o Define and maintain the overall solution architecture for various projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives and technology standards.o Provide technical leadership and guidance to development teams on best practices, standards, and frameworks.4. Integration:o Integrate various systems and applications, including Dynamics AX, to streamline business processes and improve efficiency.o Ensure seamless data flow and interoperability between different systems.5. Technology Evaluation:o Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends to continuously improve the technology stack.o Evaluate and recommend new tools, frameworks, and technologies that can enhance the development process and product quality.6. Collaboration:o Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and business stakeholders, to gather requirements and define technical solutions.o Act as a liaison between technical teams and business units to ensure successful project deliveryExperience:• 8-10 yrs total experience
